items.sentence: Learning is one thing and common sense is another.
Tom's father caught him by the scruff of the neck.
Would you drink a gin and tonic if I made you one?
I'm afraid Tom is going to drink himself to death.
Tom wanted to drink vodka, but he didn't have any.
Tom didn't drink anything at the party last night.
Tom sat and drank coffee while he waited for Mary.
I'm sorry, sir, but a jacket and tie are required.
Abraham Lincoln's father was a carpenter by trade.
I'm fixing the radio which I found on my way home.
It's pointless trying to keep Tom from doing that.
What kind of bait did you use to catch these fish?
Tom is no longer the womanizer that he used to be.
We used to live in Australia when you were a baby.
We went to Australia last year for the first time.
What did you do in Australia while you were there?
Is it all right to take pictures in this building?
When are you going to stop laughing like an idiot?
I wonder why no one has thought about this before.
I can't go today. I have to study for a math exam.
